channel.title: Restarting your server?
channel.description: if my server go's down can someone tell me to how to a proper restart. because when i close black box and open it again it still doesnt work for other players. many thanks james.

item.title: Restarting your server?
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

no, it just wen my server goes down, i open the run box again, but it still doesnt work…?

item.title: Restarting your server?
item.dc:creator: @0.o 0.o
item.description:
@0.o wrote:

first off, black box bein cmd? and u want a servre start and restarter? also when u start server up agian does it say port already in uses (sounds dumb but even if i close my cmd my server stays running) and are u planning on keeping up all night so u want something that incase it crashes server starts.

Read full topic
